channel.title: Interleaved RSS Feed
channel.description: This is an interleaved feed of the most recent entries from each RSS source, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: What to Invest in When You’re NOT Buying Real Estate
item.description: Struggling to pick what to invest in, especially when real estate prices and mortgage rates are still so high? Many investors are sitting on the sidelines, saving cash for their […]

item.title: Reddit is bringing AI-powered, automatic translation to dozens of new countries
item.description: Reddit is bringing machine learning-powered translations to more than 35 new languages, including Brazilian Portuguese and Spanish. © 2024 TechCrunch. All rights reserved. For personal use only.

item.title: A Wisconsin Board Says the Real Victim of Police Misconduct Is … the Government
item.description: Michael Bell says Kenosha police killed his son and covered up the truth. A victims rights board had a different takeaway.

item.title: 7 Properties in 10 Years by Turning 1 Home’s Equity Into an Entire Portfolio
item.description: This assistant principal slowly and steadily used home equity to invest, helping him acquire seven properties in just over ten years. These properties have now seen sizable appreciation, and he […]

item.title: Automattic sends WP Engine its own cease-and-desist over WordPress trademark infringement
item.description: The brouhaha in the WordPress community looks likely to escalate into a legal battle around trademarks. © 2024 TechCrunch. All rights reserved. For personal use only.

item.title: Inside Story Season 2 to Premiere on Sept. 26
item.description: The video series, developed by formerly incarcerated people, about the criminal justice system returns for another season.

item.title: How Do DSCR Lenders Calculate Your Interest Rate?
item.description: As interest rates for rental properties finally start to fall after a couple of years of painful heights, many real estate investors are renewing their interest in interest rates again. […]

item.title: Vsim, founded by Nvidia alums, raises $24M for robotics simulation tech
item.description: Manchester-based Vsim is developing a new physics simulation framework, and has raised $21.5 million from EQT Ventures and a number of backers. © 2024 TechCrunch. All rights reserved. For personal use only.

item.title: Mississippi Court Candidates Tell You Why They Should Be Elected
item.description: The Marshall Project - Jackson and Mississippi Today asked the candidates to explain why people should vote for them. Here’s who responded.

item.title: FI With 5 Kids and Debt-Free in Just Over a Decade!
item.description: Does FIRE seem impossible while raising a family? We’re about to prove that you CAN have it all. Emily and Joel are financially independent while raising five kids and still […]

item.title: Airtel taps AI to combat India’s rampant spam calls problem
item.description: Bharti Airtel is rolling out an AI-powered spam detection solution to all its customers to curb India's raging spam calls and messages problem. © 2024 TechCrunch. All rights reserved. For personal use only.

item.title: Meet the People Running for Mississippi’s Supreme Court and Other Courts
item.description: We profiled candidates for two state Supreme Court seats and other courts, and asked each to tell you in their own words why they should be elected.

item.title: Baselane’s Survey of Investors Gives Inside Look at What’s Really Happening in Real Estate
item.description: The 2024 Baselane Real Estate Investor Survey reveals optimism among investors despite rising costs. Key takeaways include: Investors Are Growing Portfolios But Skeptical No, the sky is not falling on […]

item.title: Hone Capital, a Silicon Valley firm, is being probed by the FBI
item.description: According to the FT, the FBI is now poking around nine-year-old Hone Capital, a Palo Alto, Ca.-based venture firm funded by a Chinese private equity firm, to determine whether some of its capital came from the Chinese government — and if it shared sensitive startup data with Beijing. Originally launched with $115 million from China’s […] © 2024 TechCrunch. All rights reserved. For personal use only.

item.title: How We Survived Extreme Heat in Prison
item.description: Incarcerated journalists detail the first signs of a heat wave in prison — and how they’ve coped with record-breaking temperatures.
